Title: Crystalbyte Networking for Silverlight
Description: This project is a simple implementation of some missing networking classes from the SL runtime including TcpClient, NetworkStream and several important socket layer encryptions.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project is a simple implementation of some missing networking classes from the SL runtime including TcpClient, NetworkStream and several important socket layer encryptions.

We've implemented the NetworkStream class, the TcpClient class and tested both successfully.
The next part on the agenda is the SSLStream class, unfortunately this will be a tough one.
